rules_text:
First strike
[i]Elthunder[/i] – When Tine, Rumbling Thunder enters, she deals 2 damage divided among up to two target creatures.
[i]Wrath[/i] – Whenever Tine deals combat damage to a player, she deals 1 damage to each opponent. Then attacking creatures you control with [i]Crit[/i] abilities get +1/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.
